<script>
    (function(){
        function queryString(name){
            //get url query params
            var reg = new RegExp('(^|&)' + name + '=([^&]*)(&|$)', 'i')
            var r = window.location.search.substr(1).match(reg)
            if (r != null) return unescape(r[2])
            return null
        }
        var setCookie =  function(name, val, expires, domain) {
            /*setCookie start*/
            var __CurrentMainDomain__ = (function() {
                var hostnameArray = location.hostname.split('.')
                return '.' + hostnameArray.slice(1).join('.')
            })()

            //domain = domain || __CurrentMainDomain__;
            var text = String(encodeURIComponent(val))
            var date = new Date()
            date.setTime(date.getTime() + Number(expires) * 1000)
            text += '; expires=' + date.toUTCString()
            // domain
            text += '; path=/'
            if (typeof domain != 'undefined' && domain != '') {
                text += '; domain=' + __CurrentMainDomain__
            }

            document.cookie = name + '=' + text
        }  
        function set_uk_jump_cookie() {
            var p_from_country = queryString("from_country");
            var is_manual_change_site = queryString("is_manual_change_site");
            var isFromOriginBtn = queryString('is_from_origin_btn')
            var jump_to_all = ['uk', 'in', 'mx', 'hk', 'tw', 'vn', 'se'];
            if (is_manual_change_site == 0) { // 程序内切换
                setCookie('is_manual_change_site', 0, undefined, 'shein.com')
            }
            if(jump_to_all.indexOf(p_from_country) > -1 && isFromOriginBtn == 0){  //跨域回跳
                setCookie("jump_to_"+p_from_country, "0", 3600 * 24, 1)
            }
        }
        set_uk_jump_cookie()
    })()
</script>
    <!-- 最顶部加载cookieId.html -->

<script>
    var PageGroup = '商品详情页'
    var PageGroupOverview = '商品详情页'
    var pageTypeForMonitor = 'product-detail'
    var aod_id = '0'

    if (location.search.indexOf('ici') !== -1) {
        var searchArr = location.search.split('&')
        searchArr.forEach(function(val) {
            if (val.indexOf('ici') !== -1) { 
                var iciStr = val.split('_')
                iciStr.forEach(function(v,i) {
                    if (v.indexOf('aod') > -1) {
                        aod_id = v.split('=')[1] || '0'
                    }
                })
            }
        })
    }
    
    window.SaPageInfo = {
        page_id: 7,
        page_name: 'page_goods_detail',
        page_param: {
            goods_id: '1195162',
            aod_id: aod_id,
        },
        start_time: Date.now(),
    }

    <script>
  var lang = 'us';
  var webClient = 'shein';
  var appLanguage = 'en';
  (function (i, s, o, g, r, a, m) {
    i['GoogleAnalyticsObject'] = r;
    i[r] = i[r] || function () {
      (i[r].q = i[r].q || []).push(arguments)
    }, i[r].l = 1 * new Date();
    a = s.createElement(o),
      m = s.getElementsByTagName(o)[0];
    a.async = 1;
    a.src = g;
    m.parentNode.insertBefore(a, m)
  })(window, document, 'script', '//www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js', 'ga');

  function GB_ga_getCookie(name){
    var value = "; " + document.cookie;
    var parts = value.split("; " + name + "=");
    if (parts.length >= 2) {
      return decodeURIComponent(parts.pop().split(";").shift())
    } else {
      return ''
    }
  }
  function dateFormat(fmt, d) {
    const o = {
      'M+': d.getMonth() + 1, // 月份
      'd+': d.getDate(), // 日
      'h+': d.getHours(), // 小时
      'm+': d.getMinutes(), // 分
      's+': d.getSeconds(), // 秒
      'q+': Math.floor((d.getMonth() + 3) / 3), // 季度
      S: d.getMilliseconds() // 毫秒
    }
    if (/(y+)/.test(fmt)) fmt = fmt.replace(RegExp.$1, (d.getFullYear() + '').substr(4 - RegExp.$1.length))
    for (var k in o) if (new RegExp('(' + k + ')').test(fmt)) fmt = fmt.replace(RegExp.$1, RegExp.$1.length == 1 ? o[k] : ('00' + o[k]).substr(('' + o[k]).length))
    return fmt
  }

  window.GB_ANALYSIS_GA = webClient === 'romwe' ? 'us' :'shein'
  window.GB_ANALYSIS_GA_SET = GB_ANALYSIS_GA + '.set'
  window.GB_ANALYSIS_GA_SEND = GB_ANALYSIS_GA + '.send'
  window.GB_ga_currentRate = Number('1') || 1
  window.PageGroup = window.PageGroup || 'other'
  window.PageGroupOverview = window.PageGroupOverview || 'other'
  window.PageGroupEmarsys = window.PageGroupEmarsys || 'other'
  window.GB_GA_pageview = null

  window.GB_ga_transformPrice = function(val) {
    if(GB_ga_currentRate) {
      return (val/GB_ga_currentRate).toFixed(2)
    } else {
      return val
    }
  }
  var _gaGetQueryString = function(name) {
    //get url query params
    var reg = new RegExp("(^|&)" + name + "=([^&]*)(&|$)", "i");
    var r = window.location.search.substr(1).match(reg);
    if (r != null) return unescape(r[2]); return null;
  }

  function GBGaSend(params) {
    var payload = [GB_ANALYSIS_GA_SEND, 'event']
    for (var key in params) {
      if (typeof params[key] !== 'undefined') {
        payload.push(params[key])
      }
      if (key == 'beacon') {
        payload.push({ transport: 'beacon' })
      }
    }
    ga.apply(null, payload)
  }

  !function () {
    var isCreated = false;
    GB_GA_pageview = function() {
      var isRomwe = webClient === 'romwe'
      let userIdKey = isRomwe ? 'rw_gap_id' : 'rw_gap_id'
      var trackingId = isRomwe ? 'UA-56523842-1' : 'UA-22263122-1'
      var userID = window.analysisUserId = GB_ga_getCookie(userIdKey) || '';
      var cookieId = GB_ga_getCookie("cookieId") || '';

      if(!isCreated) {
        ga('create', trackingId, 'auto', { userId: userID, 'name': GB_ANALYSIS_GA });
        ga('require', 'linkid', 'linkid.js');
        ga(GB_ANALYSIS_GA+'.require', 'ec');
        isCreated = true
      }
      ga(GB_ANALYSIS_GA_SET, 'dimension2', userID)
      ga(GB_ANALYSIS_GA_SET, 'dimension18', cookieId)
      ga(GB_ANALYSIS_GA_SET, 'dimension36', appLanguage)
      ga(GB_ANALYSIS_GA_SET, 'dimension37', dateFormat('yyyy/MM/dd hh:mm:ss', new Date()))
      ga(GB_ANALYSIS_GA_SET, 'dimension39', 'us')

      ga(function() {
        var clientID = ga.getByName(GB_ANALYSIS_GA).get('clientId');
        ga(GB_ANALYSIS_GA_SET, 'dimension1', clientID);
      });

      

      ga(GB_ANALYSIS_GA_SET, 'contentGroup1', PageGroupOverview);
      if("undefined" != typeof PageGroup) {
        ga(GB_ANALYSIS_GA_SET, 'contentGroup2', PageGroup);
      }

      typeof SaPageInfo === 'object'
        ? ga(GB_ANALYSIS_GA_SET, 'dimension19', cookieId + ',' + (SaPageInfo.page_name || 'noPageName') + (SaPageInfo.start_time || 'noTime'))
        : ga(GB_ANALYSIS_GA_SET, 'dimension19', 'noDefinedSaPageInfo')

      // ga分流维度 上传type_id
      

      if(_gaGetQueryString('ici')) {
        ga(GB_ANALYSIS_GA_SET, 'dimension7', _gaGetQueryString('ici'));
      }
      
        ga(
          GB_ANALYSIS_GA_SET,
          "dimension20",
          "样式A"
        )
      
      

      

      ga(GB_ANALYSIS_GA_SET, 'location', location.href);
      ga(GB_ANALYSIS_GA_SEND, 'pageview');

    }
    GB_GA_pageview()
  }();

  window.ScarabQueue = window.ScarabQueue || [];
  (function (subdomain, id) {
    var site = ''

  })('https:' == document.location.protocol ? 'https://recommender' : 'http://cdn', 'scarab-js-api');

    <script>
  (function() {
    var list=[" Daum/"," DeuSu/"," MuckRack/"," splash "," Sysomos/"," um-LN/","(^|\\s)Site","\\(vBSEO\\;","^&lt;","^12345","^<","^\\!","^\\[","^acoon","^ActiveBookmark","^ActiveRefresh","^Ad Muncher","^AddThis","^AHC/","^Amazon CloudFront","^AmigaVoyager","^Anonymous_agent","^Apache","^asafaweb\\.com","^asynchttp","^axios/","^Azureus","^biglotron","^binlar","^Blackboard Safeassign","^Bloglines","^Browsershots","^btwebclient/","^BUbiNG","^CakePHP","^Camo Asset Proxy","^CATExplorador/\\d","^ClamAV[\\s/]","^Client","^Custom$","^DAP ","^DavClnt","^Digg","^Dispatch/\\d","^Disqus/","^docomo/","^Download","^drupact","^Drupal","^DuckDuckGo","^Evernote Clip     var regex

    function update () {
      regex = new RegExp('(' + list.join('|') + ')', 'i')
    }

    window.isbot = function (userAgent) {
      return regex.test(userAgent)
    }

    try {
      // Address: Cubot browser
      // Risk: Uses lookbehind assertion
      new RegExp('(?<! cu)bot').test('dangerbot')
      list.splice(list.lastIndexOf('bot'), 1)
      list.push('(?<! cu)bot')
      list.splice(list.lastIndexOf('search'), 1)
      list.push('(?<! (ya|yandex))search')
    } catch (error) {
      // ignore errors
    }

    update()

    window.isClientBot = false
    try {
      window.isClientBot = isbot(navigator.userAgent)
    } catch (e) {}
  })();

    <script>
    // 环境变量 localhost/debug/gray/production
    var NODE_SERVER_ENV = 'production';

    var ErrorJs = (function(global) {
        if(global.ErrorJs) return global.ErrorJs;

        var _errorMap = {}; // 存储错误id，判断是否是重复上报
        var _config = {
            id: 0, // id, 若没有id不会上报
            url: 'https://www.srmdata.com/unusual', // 上报 接口
            ignore: [], // 忽略某个错误, 支持 Regexp 和 Function
            random: 1, // 抽样 0-1 1为全量
            delay: 1000, // 延迟上报
            repeat: 5, // 重复上报次数(对于同一个错误超过多少次不上报),
            hostnameFilter: ['shein.com', 'shein.co', 'shein.in', 'shein.tw', 'shein.se', 'sheinoutlet.com', 'emmacloth.com', 'makemechic.com', 'romwe.com', 'romwe.co'],
            envFilter: ['localhost', 'debug', 'gray']
        };

        var E = {
            extend: function(target, source) {
                for(var key in source) {
                    target[key] = source[key];
                }
                return target;
            },
            isObject: function(value) {
                return Object.prototype.toString.call(value) === '[object Object]';
            },
            checkType: function(value, type) {
                return Object.prototype.toString.call(value) === '[object ' + type + ']';
            },
            // 判断重复次数是否超过配置的次数
            isRepeat: function(id) {
                if(!id) return false;
                var times = _errorMap[id] = (parseInt(_errorMap[id], 10) || 0) + 1;
                return times > _config.repeat;
            },
            isRandomPassed: function() {
                return Math.random() >= _config.random;
            },
            // 根据ignore配置项过滤掉不需要上报的错误
            shouldIgnore: function(msg) {
                var ignoreConf = _config.ignore;
                return ignoreConf.some(function(value) {
                    return (E.checkType(value, 'RegExp') && value.test(msg)) || (E.checkType(value, 'Function') && value(msg));
                })
            },
            filterEnvAndHost: function() {
                var hostname = '';
                if(global.location) hostname = global.location.hostname;
                // 本地/测试/灰度环境不上报，不在监控域名内的不上报
                var envPass = _config.envFilter.indexOf(NODE_SERVER_ENV) === -1;
                var hostPass = _config.hostnameFilter.some(function(host) {
                    return hostname.indexOf(host) > -1;
                });

                return  envPass && hostPass;
            }
        }

        // 重写onerror方法
        var orgError = global.onerror;
        global.onerror = function(msg, url, row, col, error) {
            var _id = msg + ',' + row + ',' + col;
            var errorObj = {
                msg: msg,
                url: url,
                row: row,
                col: col,
                error: error,
                _id: _id
            }
            if(_config.id) {
                report.filterError(errorObj)
            }
            orgError && orgError.apply(global, arguments);
        }

        var report = global.ErrorJs = {
            // 初始化
            init: function(config) {
                if(E.isObject(config)) {
                    _config = E.extend(_config, config);
                }
                return report;
            },
            sendError: function(errorType, url, data) {
                data = E.extend(data, report.extraParams);
                if(global.sa) {
                    global.sa(errorType, url, data);
                }
            },
            filterError: function(errorObj) {
                if (typeof window.isClientBot !== 'undefined' && window.isClientBot) return

                var errorBaseData = {
                    page_type: '',
                    browser_ua: '',
                    client_url: errorObj.url,
                    error_type: 'script_error',
                    error_data: errorObj.msg,
                    error_col: errorObj.col,
                    error_row: errorObj.row,
                    error_stack: errorObj.error && errorObj.error.stack || '',
                }
                if(E.shouldIgnore(errorObj.msg)) return;
                if(E.isRepeat(errorObj._id)) return;
                if(E.isRandomPassed()) return;
                if(!E.filterEnvAndHost()) return;

                report.sendError('error', _config.url, errorBaseData);
            },
            extraParams: {
                page_type: '', // 页面类型
                page_type_detail: '' // 页面类型详情
            },

            __onerror__: orgError
        }

        return report;
    }(window))

    var ignoreArr = [/Script error/i, /\$ is not defined/i, /Vue is not defined/i, /transformImg/i, /UET/, /"Vue" is not defined/i];

    ErrorJs.init({
        id: 1,
        url: 'https://www.srmdata.com/unusual',
        ignore: ignoreArr,
        random: 1,
        repeat: 1,
    })

    ErrorJs.extraParams.page_type = window.pageTypeForMonitor || 'other';
</script>

<script>
    var loadingStartTime = new Date().getTime();
    function getServerUrl() {
        var environment = 'production';
        var url = '';
        switch(environment) {
            case 'gray':
                url = 'https://api-sensors.shein.com/sa?project=project_gray'
                break
            case 'production':
                url = 'https://api-sensors.shein.com/sa?project=production'
                break
            default:
                url = 'https://api-sensors.shein.com/sa?project=default'
                break
        }
        return url
    }
    function getCookie(name) {
        var value = "; " + document.cookie;
        var parts = value.split("; " + name + "=");
        if (parts.length >= 2) {
            return decodeURIComponent(parts.pop().split(";").shift())
        } else {
            return undefined;
        }
    }
    function getShowLog() {
        // sensor-analysisi-show-log  2 展示 3 隐藏 
        // 0 根据环境变量判断
        var tag = 0
        var result = 0
        try {
            tag = sessionStorage.getItem('sensor-analysisi-show-log') || getCookie('sensor-show-log') || 0
        } catch(e) {}
        switch (Number(tag)) {
            case 2:
                result = true
                break
            case 3:
                result = false
                break
            case 0:
                // result = 'production' === 'production' ? false : true
                resule = false
                break
        }
        return result
    }
    // 神策埋点
    (function(para) {
      var p = para.sdk_url, n = para.name, w = window, d = document, s = 'script',x = null,y = null;
      w['sensorsDataAnalytic201505'] = n;
      w[n] = w[n] || function(a) {return function() {(w[n]._q = w[n]._q || []).push([a, arguments]);}};
      var ifs = ['track','quick','register','registerPage','registerOnce','clearAllRegister','trackSignup', 'trackAbtest', 'setProfile','setOnceProfile','appendProfile', 'incrementProfile', 'deleteProfile', 'unsetProfile', 'identify','login','logout','trackLink','clearAllRegister'];
      for (var i = 0; i < ifs.length; i++) {
        w[n][ifs[i]] = w[n].call(null, ifs[i]);
      }
      if (!w[n]._t) {
        x = d.createElement(s), y = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0];
        x.async = 1;
        x.src = p;
        w[n].para = para;
        y.parentNode.insertBefore(x, y);
      }
    })({
        sdk_url: '//sheinsz.ltwebstatic.com/she_dist/libs/sensors/sensorsdata-1.14.20.min.js',
        name: 'sensors',
        server_url: getServerUrl(),
        heatmap: {
            clickmap: 'default',
            scroll_notice_map: 'default',
            scroll_delay_time: 1000,
            collect_input: false
        },
        scrollmap: {
            collect_url: function() {
                // 只采集首页
                return window.SaPageInfo && window.SaPageInfo.page_name == 'page_home'
            }
        },
        show_log: getShowLog(),
        preset_properties: {
            url: true
        },
        batch_send: true
    })
    
    sensors.registerPage({
        platform_type:'pc',
        site_type: 'shein',
        site_id: 'us',
        site_language: 'en',
        currency: 'USD',
        browser_language: navigator.language || navigator.userLanguage,
        local_time: function() {
            return new Date()
        },
        page_nm: function() {
            return window.SaPageInfo && window.SaPageInfo.page_name || ''
        }
    })
    sensors.setProfile({ cookie_id: getCookie('cookieId')})
    getCookie('userinfo_userId') && sensors.login(getCookie('userinfo_userId'))
    sensors.quick('autoTrack');

    window.addEventListener('load', function() {
        var loadingEndTime = new Date().getTime()
        sensors.track('PageLoadTime', {
            loadTime: loadingEndTime - loadingStartTime
        })
    })
</script>

        <script>
        if (navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase().match(/phone|pad|pod|iphone|ipod|ios|ipad|android/)) {
        	if (document.body.clientWidth <= 980) {
        		document.getElementById("viewport").setAttribute('content','');
        	}
        	window.addEventListener("onorientationchange" in window ? "orientationchange": "resize", function() {
        		setTimeout(function() {
        			if (document.body.clientWidth <= 980) {
        				document.getElementById("viewport").setAttribute('content','');
        			} else {
        				document.getElementById("viewport").setAttribute('content','width=device-width, initial-scale=1, maximum-scale=1, maximum-scale=1, user-scalable=no');
        			}
        		}, 500)
        	}, false);
        }
        </script>
    <script>
        var S_Module = S_Module || {};
        (function(){
            var modules = {};
            //定义
            S_Module.define = function(name, obj){
                modules[name] = obj;
            };
            //引用模块
            S_Module.require = function(name){
                if( modules[name] )
                return modules[name];
                // else
                // console.error('模块 ' + name + ' 加载失败');
            };
            S_Module.initModule = function(arr, opts){
                opts = opts || {};
                for( var i=0; i<arr.length; i++ ){
                    var name = arr[i];
                    var module = modules[name];
                    if( module ){
                        module.initialize && module.initialize(opts);
                    } else {
                        // console.error('模块 ' + name + ' 加载失败');
                    }
                }
            };
        })();
    </script>

<script>
    var gbExposeTraceid
    ;!function() {
        var traceidComponents = {}

        //购物流程 traceid 追踪
        gbExposeTraceid = function(type, payload) {
            try {
                var traceids = JSON.parse(sessionStorage.getItem('saTraceids'))

                if(!traceids) {
                    traceids = {}
                }
                var defaultTraceid = 'spc`' + Date.now() + '`'+ (window.gbGetCookie('cookieId') || '')
                var traceid =''
                if(type == 'setComponent') {
                    if(!traceidComponents[payload.componentName]) {
                        traceid = payload.traceid || defaultTraceid
                        if(payload.params){
                            traceid +='`'+payload.params
                        }
                        traceidComponents[payload.componentName] = traceid
                    }else{
                        traceid = traceidComponents[payload.componentName]
                    }
                } else if(type == 'getComponent') {
                    if(!traceidComponents[payload.componentName]){
                        traceidComponents[payload.componentName] = defaultTraceid
                    }
                    traceid = traceidComponents[payload.componentName]
                } else if(type == 'setProduct') {
                    traceid = payload.traceid || defaultTraceid
                    if(payload.params){
                        traceid +='`'+payload.params
                    }
                    traceids[payload.goods_id] = traceid
                } else if(type == 'getProduct') {
                    if(!traceids[payload.goods_id]){
                      traceids[payload.goods_id] = defaultTraceid
                    }
                    traceid = traceids[payload.goods_id]
                }
                sessionStorage.setItem('saTraceids', JSON.stringify(traceids))
                return traceid
            } catch (error) {
                console.log(error);
            }
        }
    }();
    var gbAddBagTraceFrom
    ;!function() {
        //追踪加车来源
        gbAddBagTraceFrom = function(type, payload) {
            var tracefrom = null
            var addBagFrom = ''
            try {
                tracefrom = JSON.parse(sessionStorage.getItem('saAddBagTraceFrom')) || {}
                if(type == 'setProductFrom') {
                    tracefrom[payload.goods_id] = payload.from || 'other'
                } else if(type == 'getProductFrom') {
                    addBagFrom = tracefrom[payload.goods_id] || 'other'
                }
                sessionStorage.setItem('saAddBagTraceFrom', JSON.stringify(tracefrom))
                return addBagFrom
            } catch (error) {
                console.log(error);
            }
        }
    }();
    var gbGetCookie = function(name) {
        var value = "; " + document.cookie;
        var parts = value.split("; " + name + "=");
        if (parts.length >= 2) {
            return decodeURIComponent(parts.pop().split(";").shift())
        } else {
            return undefined;
        }
    }

    var gbGetQueryString = function(name) {
        //get url query params
        var reg = new RegExp('(^|&)' + name + '=([^&]*)(&|$)', 'i')
        var r = window.location.search.substr(1).match(reg)
        if (r != null) return unescape(r[2])
        return null
    }
    window.gbExposeTraceid = gbExposeTraceid
    window.gbGetCookie = gbGetCookie
    window.gbGetQueryString = gbGetQueryString
    window.gbAddBagTraceFrom = gbAddBagTraceFrom
</script>

            <div class="one-tr">
            
                
                    
                        <h6 class="j-nav2-third">
                            <a title="Sandals" style="color: #000;" class="" href="https://us.shein.com/Sandals-c-1751.html?icn=sandals&amp;ici=us_tab01navbar08menu01&amp;srctype=category&amp;userpath=category>WOMEN>SHOES-ACC>Sandals&amp;scici=navbar_2~~tab01navbar08menu01~~8_1~~real_1751~~SPcCccWomenCategory_default~~0~~0" data-node-id="" da-event-click="2-2-1" data-scici="navbar_2~~tab01navbar08menu01~~8_1~~real_1751~~SPcCccWomenCategory_default~~0~~0">

<script>
    (function() {
        var setCookie = function(name, val, expires, domain) {
            /*setCookie start*/
            var __CurrentMainDomain__ = (function() {
                var hostnameArray = location.hostname.split('.')
                return '.' + hostnameArray.slice(-2).join('.')
            })()

            //domain = domain || __CurrentMainDomain__;
            var text = String(encodeURIComponent(val))
            var date = new Date()
            date.setTime(date.getTime() + Number(expires) * 1000)
            text += '; expires=' + date.toUTCString()
            // domain
            text += '; path=/'
            if (typeof domain != 'undefined' && domain != '') {
                text += '; domain=' + __CurrentMainDomain__
            }

            document.cookie = name + '=' + text
        }
        var getCookie = function(name) {
            var value = "; " + document.cookie;
            var parts = value.split("; " + name + "=");
            if (parts.length >= 2) {
                return decodeURIComponent(parts.pop().split(";").shift())
            } else {
                return undefined;
            }
        }
        if (location.pathname == '/') {
            setCookie('cate_active_name', 0, 3600 * 24 * 30)
            setCookie('cate_channel_type', document.querySelector('.j-nav-first-cate-0').dataset.channel_type, 3600 * 24 * 30)
        }
        var cate_active_name = getCookie('cate_active_name')
        document.querySelector('.j-nav2-ctn-holder').style.display = 'none'

        if (cate_active_name && document.querySelector('.j-nav-first-cate-' + cate_active_name) && document.querySelector('.j-nav2-ctn-' + cate_active_name)) {

            document.querySelector('.j-nav-first-cate-' + cate_active_name).className += ' cate-active'
            document.querySelector('.j-nav2-ctn-' + cate_active_name).style.display = 'table-cell'
            setCookie('cate_channel_type', document.querySelector('.j-nav-first-cate-' + cate_active_name).dataset.channel_type, 3600 * 24 * 30)

        } else if (document.querySelector('.j-nav-first-cate-0') && document.querySelector('.j-nav2-ctn-0')) {

            document.querySelector('.j-nav-first-cate-0').className += ' cate-active'
            document.querySelector('.j-nav2-ctn-0').style.display = 'table-cell'
            setCookie('cate_channel_type', document.querySelector('.j-nav-first-cate-0').dataset.channel_type, 3600 * 24 * 30)

        }
    })()
</script>

</header>

                            Free standard shipping on orders over US$49.00

<p><font size="2" color="#ff0000">#SHEINcares - Because everyone has been asked to stay at home, we want to do our part to help. For all orders placed after February 1, 2020, the return window has been extended from 45 days to 75 days.</font></p>

<p><font size="2"><span style="font-size: small;">The following conditions must be met:</span></font><span style="font-size: small;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p><font size="2"><span style="font-size: small;">1. Items must be returned within 45 days after the purchase date.</span></font></p>
<p><font size="2"><font size="2"> 2. Items must be unworn, undamaged and in original packaging.<br>

    <script>
var GB_webp_url = [
    'img.shein.com/images/',
    'img.shein.com/images2/',
    'img.shein.com/images3/',

    'img.romwe.com/images/',
    'img.romwe.com/images2_rw/',
    'img.romwe.com/images3_rw/',

    'img.ltwebstatic.com/images2/',
    'img.ltwebstatic.com/banner/',
    'img.ltwebstatic.com/images2_app/',

    'img.ltwebstatic.com/images3_pi/',
    'img.ltwebstatic.com/images3_sqs/',
]
var GB_is_support_webp = -1; // -1: 未请求完, 1: 支持, 0: 不支持
function GB_transform_webp_img(img) {
    GB_webp_url.forEach(function(item) {
        if (img.indexOf(item) > -1) {
            img = img.replace(/\b(.jpg)\b/, ".webp")
            return
        }
    })
    return img
}

;(function(w, d){
  function check_webp(feature, callback) {
      switch (GB_is_support_webp) {
          case -1:
              var result = false
              try {
                  result = document.createElement('canvas').toDataURL('image/webp', 0.5).indexOf('data:image/webp') === 0;
              } catch(err) {
              }
              GB_is_support_webp = result ? 1 : 0;
              callback(feature, GB_is_support_webp);

              // var kTestImages = {
              //     lossy: "UklGRiIAAABXRUJQVlA4IBYAAAAwAQCdASoBAAEADsD+JaQAA3AAAAAA",
              //     lossless: "UklGRhoAAABXRUJQVlA4TA0AAAAvAAAAEAcQERGIiP4HAA==",
              //     alpha: "UklGRkoAAABXRUJQVlA4WAoAAAAQAAAAAAAAAAAAQUxQSAwAAAARBxAR/Q9ERP8DAABWUDggGAAAABQBAJ0BKgEAAQAAAP4AAA3AAP7mtQAAAA==",
              //     animation: "UklGRlIAAABXRUJQVlA4WAoAAAASAAAAAAAAAAAAQU5JTQYAAAD/////AABBTk1GJgAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAGQAAABWUDhMDQAAAC8AAAAQBxAREYiI/gcA"
              // };
              // var img = new Image();
              // img.onload = function () {
              //     var result = (img.width > 0) && (img.height > 0);
              //     GB_is_support_webp = 1;
              //     callback(feature, result);
              // };
              // img.onerror = function () {
              //     GB_is_support_webp = 0;
              //     callback(feature, false);
              // };
              // img.src = "data:image/webp;base64," + kTestImages[feature];
              break;
          default:
              callback(feature, GB_is_support_webp);
      }
  }

  check_webp('lossless', function(feature, result) {
    var b = d.getElementsByTagName('body')[0];
    var s = d.createElement("script"); s.async = true;
    var v = !("IntersectionObserver" in w) ? "8.7.1" : "10.5.2";
    s.src = "//sheinsz.ltwebstatic.com/she_dist/libs/lazyload_verlok_"+ v +".min.js";

    w.lazyLoadOptions = {
        elements_selector: '.j-verlok-lazy',
        threshold: 50,
        data_src: 'lazy-src',
        data_bg: 'lazy-src',
        callback_enter: function(el) {
            var src = $(el).attr('data-src')
            $(el).attr('data-lazy-src', result ? GB_transform_webp_img(src) : src)
        },
        callback_load: function(el) {
            (function(el) {
                var $el = $(el);
                var $parent;
                if ($el.hasClass('j-index-banner')) {
                    $el.parents('.j-index-banner-ctn').addClass('no-gap')
                }
            })(el)
        }
    };
    b.appendChild(s);
    w.addEventListener('LazyLoad::Initialized', function (e) {
        w.GB_SHEIN_lazyLoadInstance = e.detail.instance;
        w.GB_SHEIN_lazyLoadInstance.update();
    }, false);
  })
}(window, document));

</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
  var support = {};
  $(function(){
    requestAnimationFrame(function() {
    if($('.j-customer-vue').length) {
      support = new Vue({
        el: '.j-customer-vue',
        data: {
            showSustomer: false,
            loginModalText: {},
            lang_footer_customer: '',
            SHEIN_PC_KEY_4097: '',
        },
        methods: {
          htmlDecode: SHEIN_W.htmlDecode,
          getCustomerChannel: function() {
            var self = this;
            $.get('/getCustomerChannel', function(res) {
              self.showSustomer = true;//接口如果错误展示默认
              if(res && res.code == 0 && res.info && res.info.entrance && res.info.entrance.navigationBar && res.info.entrance.navigationBar.open == 0) {
                self.showSustomer = false; //请求成功未发布不显示
              }
              if(res && res.code == 0 && res.info && res.info.pageDesc && res.info.pageDesc.length){

                var preRobotLoginInter = setInterval(function(){
                  if(typeof preRobotLogin != 'undefined'){
                    preRobotLogin.loginModalText = res.info.pageDesc[0]
                    clearInterval(preRobotLoginInter)
                  }
                }, 500)


              }
              if( res && res.code == 0 && res.info && res.info.desc ){
                  var desc = res.info.desc;
                  var descLen = desc.length;
                  for( var i = 0; i < descLen;i++ ){
                      if(desc[i].channelName === 'ContactCustomerService'){
                          self.lang_footer_customer = desc[i].title;
                          self.SHEIN_PC_KEY_4097 = desc[i].content;
                      }
                  }
              }
            })
          },
          openRobot: function() {
            $.ajax({
              type: 'POST',
              url: '/user/auth/getUserInfo',
              async: false,
              success: function(res) {
                var pageName = "navigationBar";
                if(typeof SaPageInfo != "undefined") {
                  if(SaPageInfo.page_name == 'page_order_list'){
                    pageName = "orderListPage"
                  }else if(SaPageInfo.page_name == 'page_order_detail'){
                    pageName = "orderDetailPage"
                  }else if(SaPageInfo.page_name == 'page_checkout'){
                    pageName = "checkoutPage"
                  }else if(SaPageInfo.page_name == 'page_goods_detail'){
                    pageName = "productDetailPage"
                  }

                }

                  if (res.username != null) {
                     //跳转客服机器人页面
                     window.open(location.origin+'/robot?page=navigationBar')
                  } else {

                    preRobotLogin.loginModalShow()
                    window.LOGIN_GA_POPUPS_SEND({ scenes: 'livechat' })
                    // onlineHelpLoginPopGA({action:"PopUps",label:"Sign-ClickLiveChat"})
                  }

                if(typeof sa != 'undefined') {
                  if(typeof SaPageInfo == "undefined"){
                    SaPageInfo = {
                      page_id: 0,
                      page_name:'page_other',
                      page_param: {},
                    };
                  }
                  sa('send',{
                    'activity_name':'click_support',
                    activity_param: {
                        'type': 'customer_service'
                    },
                  })
                }
              }
            })
            GBGaSend({
                category: '客服相关',
                action: 'ClickCustomerService',
                label: '导航栏'
            })
          },
          messageUs: function(){
            var memberId = gbCommonInfo.user && gbCommonInfo.user.member_id
            if(memberId) {
                var newWin = window.open();
                $.get('/user/auth/bothubBindInfo',function( data ){
                    if(data.code == 0 && data.info && data.info.bindId) {
                      newWin.location = "https://m.me/380039845369159?ref=engagement:kbt:0,bind:" + data.info.bindId;
                    }else {
                      newWin.location = "https://m.me/380039845369159?ref=engagement:kbt:0"
                    }
                })
            }else {
                // window.open("https://m.me/122630408404372?ref=engagement:7ip:0")
                window.open('https://m.me/380039845369159?ref=engagement:kbt:0')
            }
            if(typeof sa != 'undefined') {
              if(typeof SaPageInfo == "undefined"){
                  SaPageInfo = {
                      page_id: 0,
                      page_name:'page_other',
                      page_param: {},
                  };
              }
              GBGaSend({
                  category: '导航栏',
                  action: 'ClickMessenge',
                  label: 'No'
              })
            }
        },
      },
      mounted: function(){
        var _this = this;
        _this.getCustomerChannel();
      }

     })
    }
    })
  })


</script>
<script>

  window.V_Comp = {}
  var pattern= /^([\w-\.]+)@((\[[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.)|(([\w-]+\.)+))([a-zA-Z]{2,6}|[0-9]{1,3})(\]?)$/
  var GB_SHEIN_check_login_promise = (SHEIN_W && SHEIN_W.userModule) ? SHEIN_W.userModule.check_login_promise() : null;
  ;(function() {
    var currencies = gbCommonInfo.currencies

    if(GB_SHEIN_check_login_promise) {
      // 动态设置登录用户名, 货币
      GB_SHEIN_check_login_promise.then(function(data) {
        var hi = "Hello "
        var loginURL = "https://us.shein.com/user/auth/login?direction=nav"
        var loginPrompt = "Sign in / Register"
        var username = data.username
        var currency = data.currency
        var email = data.email
        var member_id = data.member_id
        if(email && !SHEIN_W.getCookie('userinfo_email')) {
            SHEIN_W.setCookie('userinfo_email', email, '60 * 60 * 24 * 7')
        }

        if(member_id && !SHEIN_W.getCookie('userinfo_userId')) {
            SHEIN_W.setCookie('userinfo_userId', member_id, '60 * 60 * 24 * 7')
        }
        if(member_id && !SHEIN_W.getCookie('memberId')) {
            SHEIN_W.setCookie('memberId', member_id, '60 * 60 * 24 * 7')
        }
        if (window.PageGroupOverview === '商品详情页' || window.PageGroupOverview === '列表页') {
            var _search = document.location.search.indexOf('?') === 0 ? (document.location.search + '&_prot=1') : '?_prot=1'
            loginURL = "https://us.shein.com/user/auth/login?redirection=" + encodeURIComponent(document.location.pathname + _search)
        }

        window._abt_server_provider.getUserAbtResult({ posKeys: 'MyAccount' }).then(function(abtInfo) {
          var isNewMyAccount = abtInfo && abtInfo['MyAccount'] && abtInfo['MyAccount'].param == 'type=A'
          if (isNewMyAccount) {
            $('.j-header-right-dropdown-ctn.old').remove()
          } else {
            $('.j-header-right-dropdown-ctn.new').remove()
          }
          $('.j-header-right-dropdown-ctn').removeClass('she-hide')
          $('.j-header-username').removeClass('she-hide')

          if (username != null){
            if (isNewMyAccount) {
              $('.j-header-username').html(
                '<div class="header-user-info">' +
                  '<img class="j-header-avatar avatar she-hide" width="32px" height="auto" />' +
                  '<div class="side">' +
                    '<span class="name">' + username + '</span>' +
                    '<span class="j-vip-icon vip-panel"><i class="j-shein-vip-medal"></i></span>' +
                  '</div>' +
                '</div>')
              $('.j-vip-icon').click(function(e) {
                e.preventDefault()
                sa('send', {
                    activity_name: 'click_top_site_vip',
                }, { beacon: 1 })
                window.location.href = '/user/sheinvip'
              })
              $.get('/user/getAvatarImg', function(avatarInfo) {
                var imgUrl = avatarInfo && avatarInfo.info && avatarInfo.info.img_url && avatarInfo.info.img_url.face_small_img
                if (imgUrl) {
                  $('.j-header-avatar').attr('src', transformImg(imgUrl)).removeClass('she-hide')
                }
              })
            } else {
              $('.j-header-username').html('<span class="user-name-text">' + hi + ' ' + username + '</span> <i class="j-shein-vip-medal"></i>')
            }
            // 渲染 vip 标志
            if ($('.j-shein-vip-medal') && $('.j-shein-vip-medal').length > 0) {
              var sheinVipMedal = new Vue({ el: '.j-shein-vip-medal', template: '<vip-medal jump size="S"></vip-medal>' })
            }
            $('.j-header-username, .j-header-username-icon').prop('href', "https://us.shein.com/user/index")
            $('.j-header-menu-signout').show()
            $('.j-header-menu-profile').show()

            if (!isNewMyAccount) {
              $.get('/user/tickets/getUnReadTicketNum',function(res){
                if(res.ticketNum>0) {
                  $('.j-ticket-nopenum').removeClass('she-hide')

                  if(res.ticketNum>99) {
                      res.ticketNum=99 + " + ";
                    }

                  $('.j-ticket-nopenum').text(res.ticketNum)

                  $('.j-header-robot.j-ticket-nopenum').text('')
                  SHEIN_W.userModule.show_account_tips(1);
                }
              })
            }


            if($('.j-header-msg-num').length){
                window.GB_setMsgUnread = function(){
                    //设置message 未读数
                    $.ajax({
                        type: 'get',
                        url: '/user/message/getMsgUnreadCount',
                        success: function(data){
                          var unRead;
                          if(data.code == 0 && data.info){
                            unRead = Number(data.info.order.num) +　Number(data.info.news.num);
                            if(unRead > 0){
                              if(unRead > 99){
                                  unRead=99 + "+";
                              }

                              $('.j-header-msg-num').removeClass('she-hide').html(unRead);

                              SHEIN_W.userModule.show_account_tips(1);
                            } else {
                              if(Number(data.info.activity.num)>0){
                                $('.j-header-msg-num').removeClass('she-hide').addClass('msg-activity-only');
                              }
                                $('.j-message-unreadcount').addClass('rw-hide')
                            }
                          }
                        }
                    })
                }
                GB_setMsgUnread()
            }

            SHEIN_W.userModule.get_user_profile();
            if (!isNewMyAccount) {
              SHEIN_W.userModule.toggle_account_survey_tips();
            }
            SHEIN_W.userModule.hide_account_tips();

          } else {
            $('.j-header-menu-signout').hide()
            $('.j-header-menu-profile').hide()
            $('.j-header-username').text(loginPrompt)
            $('.j-header-username, .j-header-username-icon').prop('href', loginURL)
            $('.j-user-dropdown').addClass('nologin-user-dropdown')
            SHEIN_W.delCookie('isCheckedAccountTips')


            //购物车
            $('.j-cart-unlogin').removeClass('she-hide');
            setTimeout(function(){
              if( window.cart_module && cart_module.cartVue ){
                cart_module.cartVue.$data.isLogin = false;
              }
            }, 1000)
          }
        })
        // 快速注册弹窗
        function getCookie(name) {//取最新的cookie
            var value = "; " + document.cookie;
            var parts = value.split("; " + name + "=");
            if (parts.length >= 2) {
                return decodeURIComponent(parts.pop().split(";").shift())
            } else {
                return undefined;
            }
        }
        function checkSameCookie(objName){
          var arrStr = document.cookie.split("; "),count=0;
          for (var i = 0; i < arrStr.length; i++) {
            var temp = arrStr[i].split("=");
            if (temp[0] == objName) {
              count++
            }
          }
          return count>1;
        }

        // var hostname = document.location.hostname
        // var otherDomains = [".shein.in",".shein.co.uk",".shein.tw",".shein.hk",".shein.com.mx",".shein.se",".shein.com.vn"];
        // var diffHostname = $.inArray( hostname, otherDomains )>-1;
        // var lastCookieValue = getCookie('sessionID_shein');
        //   if(!diffHostname){//存在2个相同cookie 先删除所有cookie后再设置
        //     if(checkSameCookie("sessionID_shein")){
        //       SHEIN_W.setCookie('sessionID_shein', '', -1,true);//删除根域名下cookie
        //       lastCookieValue = getCookie('sessionID_shein'); //获取子域名下cookie
        //       SHEIN_W.setCookie('sessionID_shein', '', -1); //删除子域名下cookie
        //       if (email) {
        //         SHEIN_W.setCookie('sessionID_shein', lastCookieValue, 60 * 60 * 24 * 14, true)
        //       }else {
        //          SHEIN_W.setCookie('sessionID_shein', lastCookieValue, 60 * 60 * 36, true)
        //       }
        //     }
        //
        //   }


          // 更改货币
          if(currencies[currency] && currencies[currency].code) {
              $('.j-currency-'+currencies[currency].code).parent('.j-change-currency').removeClass('j-change-currency').addClass('active')
              $('.j-flag-img').css('background-image', 'url('+ transformImg(currencies[currency].country_flag) +')');
              $('.j-currency-title').html(currencies[currency].code)

              $('.j-range-currency').text(currencies[currency].code)

              window.GB_SHEIN_currency = currencies[currency].code
          }
          if ('us' === 'ar') {
            SHEIN_W.setCookie('currency', currency, 3600 * 24)
          }
          if ('us' === 'au') {
            SHEIN_W.setCookie('currency', currency, 3600 * 24)
          }

          // 免邮信息
          $.get('/product/shippingDetail', function(shippingData){
              var freeHTML = [];
              if(shippingData && shippingData.length){
                  var freeShippingTipsData = [];
                  var textTpl = {
                    express_shipping: "&lt;storng style=&#34;text-transform: capitalize; color:#d10000; font-weight:700&#34;&gt;Free Express Shipping&lt;/storng&gt; on orders over {0}",
                    expedited_shipping: "&lt;storng style=&#34;text-transform: capitalize; color:#d10000; font-weight:700&#34;&gt;Free Flat Rate Shipping&lt;/storng&gt; on orders over {0}",
                    stand_shipping: "&lt;storng style=&#34;text-transform: capitalize; color:#d10000; font-weight:700&#34;&gt;Free Standard Shipping&lt;/storng&gt; on orders over {0}",
                    shop_transit: "free picking up at store for order over  {0}",
                  }
                  var textTpl1 = {
                    express_shipping: "&lt;storng style=&#34;text-transform: capitalize; color:#d10000; font-weight:700&#34;&gt;Free Express Shipping!&lt;/storng&gt;",
                    expedited_shipping: "&lt;storng style=&#34;text-transform: capitalize; color:#f35b6e; font-weight:700&#34;&gt;Free Flat Rate Shipping! &lt;/storng&gt;",
                    stand_shipping: "&lt;storng style=&#34;text-transform: capitalize; color:#d10000; font-weight:700&#34;&gt;Free Standard Shipping! &lt;/storng&gt;",
                    shop_transit: "&lt;strong style=&#34;color:#f35b6e; font-weight:700&#34;&gt;Free Picking Up At Store!&lt;/strong&gt;",
                  }
                  shippingData.forEach(function(val) {
                      var text = SHEIN_W.htmlDecode(textTpl[val.type] ? textTpl[val.type] : textTpl['stand_shipping']);
                      var text1 = SHEIN_W.htmlDecode(textTpl1[val.type] ? textTpl1[val.type] : textTpl1['stand_shipping']);
                      var el1 = '<span>'+SHEIN_W.template(val.full_amount.amountWithSymbol, text)+'</span>';
                      var el2 = '<span>'+text1+'</span>';
                      var invoke = Number(val.full_amount.amount);
                      if(invoke > 0){
                          freeShippingTipsData.push(el1);
                      }else if(invoke == 0 && val.shippingPrices.amount == 0){
                          freeShippingTipsData.push(el2);
                      }
                  });
                  freeHTML  = freeShippingTipsData.map(function(tip, i) {
                      var hrefVal = "" + "/Shipping-Info-a-280.html";
                      return '<li class="discount"><a href='+hrefVal+'>'+tip+'</a></li>';
                  });
              }
              // 首单优惠数据
              if(data.freeShippingTips && data.freeShippingTips.length){
                  var freeShippingTips = data.freeShippingTips;
                  freeShippingTips.forEach(function(item) {
                      freeHTML.push('<li class="discount">' + item.replace(/http\:\/\/\w+.shein.\w+/gi, '') + '</li>');
                  });
              }

              $('.j-free-shipping').append(freeHTML.join(''))

              // free shipping 动画
              var index = 0,
                  stop = false,
                  num =  $('.j-free-shipping >li').length,
                  liEls = $('.j-free-shipping >li');

              function shippingflipInX(){
                  if(stop) return false;
                  if(index > (num-2)){
                    liEls.addClass('she-none');
                    liEls.removeClass('animated flipInX she-block');
                    index = 0;
                    liEls.eq(0).addClass('animated flipInX she-block').removeClass('she-none');
                    return;
                  }

                  liEls.addClass('she-none');
                  liEls.removeClass('animated flipInX she-block');
                  //下一个
                  // liEls.eq(index).addClass('none');
                  liEls.eq(index+1).removeClass('she-none').addClass('animated flipInX she-block');
                  index ++ ;
              }
              var hdtimer = setInterval(function(){
                  shippingflipInX();
              },3000);
              $('.j-free-shipping').hover(function(){
                stop = true;
              },function(){
                stop = false;
              })
          })
      });
    }
  }());
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
  function getCookie(name){/*获取指定名称的cookie的值*/
      var value = "; " + document.cookie;
      var parts = value.split("; " + name + "=");
      if (parts.length >= 2) {
          return decodeURIComponent(parts.pop().split(";").shift())
      } else {
          return undefined;
      }
    }
</script>

    <!-- ar bg http://sheinsz.ltwebstatic.com/image/ar/n-ar-pop_v4dfb2bf.png?v=shein_494 -->
<!-- au bg //sheinsz.ltwebstatic.com/image/au/n-au-pop_vba162b3.png?v=shein_494 -->
<!-- de bg //sheinsz.ltwebstatic.com/image/de/n-de-pop_v060a870.jpg?v=shein_494 -->

    <script>
    ; (function () {
        function setCookie(name, val, expires, domain) {
            //domain = domain || __CurrentMainDomain__;
            var text = String(encodeURIComponent(val));
            var date = new Date();
            date.setTime(date.getTime() + Number(expires) * 1000);
            text += '; expires=' + date.toUTCString();
            // domain
            text += '; path=/';
            if (typeof (domain) != "undefined" && domain != "") {
                text += '; domain=' + __CurrentMainDomain__;
            }

            document.cookie = name + '=' + text;
        }

        function getCookie(name) {/*获取指定名称的cookie的值*/
            var value = "; " + document.cookie;
            var parts = value.split("; " + name + "=");
            if (parts.length >= 2) {
                return decodeURIComponent(parts.pop().split(";").shift())
            } else {
                return undefined;
            }
        }

        function currencyAutoMatch(country) {
            //中东国家默认货币
            // 1.ar和mar站根据ip，匹配对应国家的币种，在用户后首次打开时即显示匹配后的币种。
            // 2.若用户已经保存有货币，则不需要重新判断和更改
            var currencyMap = {
                SA: 'SAR',
                AE: 'AED',
                KW: 'KWD',
                QA: 'QAR',
                OM: 'OMR',
                BH: 'BHD',
            }, site = 'us',
                currency = getCookie('m_currency_' + site)

            if ((site == 'ar') && !currency && country in currencyMap) {
                currency = currencyMap[country]
                $.get('/changeCurrency?currency=' + currency, function () {
                    setCookie('m_currency_' + site, currency, 60 * 60 * 24 * 7)
                    window.location.reload(true)
                })

			} else if (site == 'asia' && country ){
				var asiaCurrencyMap = {
					'us': 'USD',
					'sa': 'SAR',
					'kw': 'KWD',
					'sg': 'SGD',
					'qa': 'QAR',
					'om': 'OMR',
					'bh': 'BHD',
					'tw': 'TWD',
					'il': 'ILS',
					'th': 'THB',
					'id': 'IDR',
					'tr': 'TRY',
					'vn': 'VND',
					'hk': 'HKD',
					'ph': 'PHP'
				}

				var asiaCountry = country.toLowerCase()

				if( !SHEIN_W.getCookie('currency') && asiaCurrencyMap[asiaCountry]) {
					var asiaCurrency = asiaCurrencyMap[asiaCountry]
					$.get('/changeCurrency?currency=' + asiaCurrency, function () {
						window.location.reload(true)
					})
				}
			}
        }

        //cookie中countryId不存在并且是非国际站
        if( (getCookie('countryId') == undefined && 'us' != 'en') || (!getCookie('currency') && gbCommonInfo.lang == 'asia') ){
            $.ajax({
                type: "POST",
                url: '/judgeIP',
                success: function (res) {
                    if (res.code != 0) return
                    var country = res.info.location.country;
                    var countryId = res.info.location.country_id;
                    setCookie('countryId', countryId, 3600 * 24 * 30, false)

                    currencyAutoMatch(country)
                }
            })
        }
    }())
</script>



    <!-- Facebook pixel  -->
<!-- 基础代码 -->

<script>
    ! function (f, b, e, v, n, t, s) {
        if (f.fbq) return;
        n = f.fbq = function () {
            n.callMethod ?
                n.callMethod.apply(n, arguments) : n.queue.push(arguments)
        };
        if (!f._fbq) f._fbq = n;
        n.push = n;
        n.loaded = !0;
        n.version = '2.0';
        n.queue = [];
        t = b.createElement(e);
        t.async = !0;
        t.src = v;
        s = b.getElementsByTagName(e)[0];
        s.parentNode.insertBefore(t, s)
    }(window, document, 'script', 'https://connect.facebook.net/en_US/fbevents.js');
    fbq('init', '992946534136988');
    fbq('track', 'PageView');
</script>
<noscript>
    <img height="1" width="1" src="https://www.facebook.com/tr?id=992946534136988&ev=PageView&noscript=1"/>
</noscript>
<script>
    window._fbq = window._fbq || [];

    
        window.fbAsyncInit = function () {
            FB.init({
                appId : '312563225523989',
                // autoLogAppEvents : true,
                status: true,
                cookie: true,
                xfbml: true,
                oauth: true,
                version: 'v3.2'
            });
        };
    
    
    
        (function (d, s, id) {
            var js, fjs = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0];
            if (d.getElementById(id)) {
                return;
            }
            js = d.createElement(s);
            js.id = id;
            js.src = "//connect.facebook.net/en_US/sdk.js";
            fjs.parentNode.insertBefore(js, fjs);
        }(document, 'script', 'facebook-jssdk'));
    


    window.doFbq = function (action, params) {
        ! function () {
            if (typeof Object.assign != 'function') {
                Object.assign = function (target) {
                    'use strict';
                    if (target == null) {
                        throw new TypeError('Cannot convert undefined or null to object');
                    }

                    target = Object(target);
                    for (var index = 1; index < arguments.length; index++) {
                        var source = arguments[index];
                        if (source != null) {
                            for (var key in source) {
                                if (Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty.call(source, key)) {
                                    target[key] = source[key];
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    return target;
                };
            }
            if (typeof fbq !== 'undefined') {
                var _form = Object.assign({}, {
                    content_type: 'product', //直接上报此文本
                    value: 1.00, //固定上报此价格
                    currency: 'USD' //固定上报此币种
                }, params)

                if(typeof fbq.init !== 'function') {
                    var _timeIndex = 0;
                    var _timeId = setInterval(function() {
                        _timeIndex++;
                        if(typeof fbq.init == 'function' || _timeIndex>5) {
                            fbq('track', action, _form);
                            clearInterval(_timeId);
                        }
                    }, 1000);
                } else {
                    fbq('track', action, _form);
                }

            }
        }();
    }
</script>



    <script type="text/javascript">
        var __CurrentMainDomain__ = (function () {
          var hostnameArray = location.hostname.split('.');
          return "." + hostnameArray.slice(-2).join('.');
        })();
        console.log('CICD615')
    </script>
